name: Screen Printed Wolf Lady T-Shirt
description:
The sexy Wolf Lady design is taken from the series of mythological Beast Drawings that I started working on in early 2011.

The shirts have been screen-printed by my own fair, and purple, hands using high quality black pigment and finished with a layer of heat-pressed silver foil. They have been printed on 100% cotton (160-165g/m²) royal blue Fruit of the Loom fitted t-shirts which have a shorter body length and side seams for a fashionable, slimmer fit (NB as result the sizes are on the small side so if you prefer a more loose fit then you may want to size-up).

This is a strictly limited edition item and only 50 copies of this shirt have been printed up so get one quick whilst you still can.

Please note that due to being printed entirely by hand each shirt will differ ever so slightly from the next. For example, the aligment of the sliver foil relative to the black shadow will vary as will the weight of line.

Sizes*:

Small 35″- 37″ chest
Medium 38″- 40″ chest
Large 41″-43″ chest

Each shirt will be shipped with a signed and numbered tag.

*Please indicate the size required when placing an order.

name: Unicorn Cake Embroidery
description: This is one of a series of five original hand embroidered works of mythical foodstuffs. This piece is an original one off individual work so snap it up quick. Each piece is hand embroidered onto canvas using metallic and cotton threads, stretched on board and mounted in a matt black kitsch ornate black mould frame as pictured. The displayed area measures approximately 6 x 4 inches. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact me.

name: Goblin Sauce Embroidery
description: This is one of a series of five original hand embroidered works of mythical foodstuffs. This piece is an original one off individual work so snap it up quick. name: Robot Unicorn Rainbow Attack
description:
This hand embroidered poster is stitched in grey, white and silver metallic cotton thread with a rainbow flourish as pictured.

The work is made with cotton threads on 160gsm black paper and measures approximately 210 x 297mm (note: paper is hand cut so there may be small variations in the overall size). The design area measures approximately 150mm across.

This item can be made to order and the colours can be altered to suit your preferences. Please contact me to discuss your order.

name: Forever Young Eternal Love
description:
This hand embroidered artwork was initially devised as a wedding anniversary gift. The words are stitched in pastel shades from champagne to white to pink with love sewn in bold red thread as pictured.

The work is made with cotton threads on 160gsm black paper and measures approximately 210 x 297mm (note: paper is hand cut so there may be small variations in the overall size). The design area measures approximately 150mm across.

This item is made to order and the colours can be altered to suit your preferences. 

Please contact me to discuss your order.

name: Mermaid Meringue Embroidery
description: This is one of a series of five original hand embroidered works of mythical foodstuffs. This piece is an original one off individual work so snap it up quick. Each piece is hand embroidered onto canvas using metallic and cotton threads, stretched on board and mounted in a matt black kitsch ornate black mould frame as pictured. The displayed area measures approximately 6 x 4 inches. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact me.

name: Hand Embroidered Black Unicorn Hoodie
description: This is a one off hooded sweater that has been embroidered by my own fair hands with high quality white, silver and pink DMC embroidery threads. The jumper is a good quality men's medium size hoodie from H&M which has a rather lovely soft lining. The design on the chest measures approximately 5" x 6" and is from my series of unicorn-porn drawings of which can see a lot more at www.unicorn-porn.com I have signed the jumper by embroidering my initials onto the label inside. Note: the jumper is brand new and unworn (save for the photographs above) but has been hand washed once in warm water to remove the residue of the embroidery process I used. **Free potage within the UK.

name: Sequinned Tote Bag
description:
These bags were hand embellished by yours truly in January 2011 for an exhibition at 20-21 Visual Art Centre in Scunthorpe, England.

Each bag has one gold side with a black circle and one black side with a gold circle and is lined with black velvet. The circles of fabric have been appliquéd on before the sequins were all hand sewn onto the canvas tote bag skeleton.

*These bags are strictly limited to an edition of 2.

Dimensions: Approximately: W.10″ x H.14″

name: Dragon Burgers Embroidery
description: This is one of a series of five original hand embroidered works of mythical foodstuffs. This piece is an original one off individual work so snap it up quick. Each piece is hand embroidered onto canvas using metallic and cotton threads, stretched on board and mounted in a matt black kitsch ornate black mould frame as pictured. The displayed area measures approximately 6 x 4 inches. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact me.

name: Limited Edition Black Abject Doll
description:
This edition of ten fabulously grotesque dolls have all been hand crafted from start to finish.. The body is crafted from leatherette, clay and polyester fibres, whilst the oversized head is constructed from synthetic fur and plaster.

They have all been hand stitched, and so although the general appearance of the dolls is uniform each doll will differ slightly from the next; as is apparent in the photographs here. The dolls have been designed in such a way that they are self supporting and will stand up on their own but do please bear in mind that they are top heavy.

The dolls will be shipped securely in double walled cardboard containers along with a certificate of authenticity which has been signed and numbered

Dimensions: approximately H.11″ x W.7″

**Free Postage in the UK

name: Peculiar Pleasures Publication
description: A 32 page catalogue/zine documenting the Peculiar Pleasures exhibition held in Cardiff at the Milkwood Gallery during November 2010. The publication feature work from some of the UKs finest illustrators such as Jonny Hannah and Ceri Amphlett alongside emerging creative talents from across the globe. Featuring the peculiarly pleasurable work of 21 individual artists this A5 catalogue is digitally printed on high quality 160gsm stock. Only a short run of Peculiar Pleasures has been produced so be sure to snap one up quick! *NB. The price includes postage within the UK.
